gold.user: User requested details for a specific participant in a conference.
gold.ideal: Response should include participant details such as status, call SID, and conference SID.

gold.user: User wants to update the status of a participant in a conference.
gold.ideal: Response should confirm the update and return the updated participant details.

gold.user: User intends to remove a participant from a conference.
gold.ideal: Response should confirm the deletion of the participant.

gold.user: User wants to add a new participant to a conference.
gold.ideal: Response should include the details of the newly created participant.

gold.user: User is looking to retrieve a list of all participants in a conference.
gold.ideal: Response should return an array of participants with their details.
